LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_TorchBelt.label: torch belt
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_TorchBelt.description: A belt with a number of wooden torches strapped to it. They can be lit up and thrown to set things ablaze. Can be refueled with wood.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Apparel_TorchBelt.verbs.0.label: throw torch
LanguageData.VFEM2_Proj_GrenadeTorch.label: thrown torch
